001.synopsis: Mijah is calm, cool and collected. Despite her young age Mijah has seen more than her fair share of fights. She is an excellent example of a Harper Veteran. This dialogue covers all main states in Haven.

002.synopsis: Bor is a grizzled Harper veteran who treats all twists of fate with the same cheerful resignation.
